description: Returns a paginated list of target engine recommendations for your source databases.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to the target engine recommendations described in the form of key-value pairs. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Specifies the unique pagination token that makes it possible to display the next page of results. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords. If NextToken is returned by a previous response, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The unique pagination token returned for you to pass to a subsequent request. Fleet Advisor returns this token when the number of records in the response is greater than the MaxRecords value. To retrieve the next page, make the call again using the returned token and keeping all other arguments unchanged.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: The list of recommendations of target engines that Fleet Advisor created for the source database.

nested_items.name: DatabaseId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the source database for which Fleet Advisor provided this recommendation.

nested_items.name: EngineName
nested_items.description: The name of the target engine. Valid values include "rds-aurora-mysql", "rds-aurora-postgresql", "rds-mysql", "rds-oracle", "rds-sql-server", and "rds-postgresql".

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date when Fleet Advisor created the target engine recommendation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of the target engine recommendation. Valid values include "alternate", "in-progress", "not-viable", and "recommended".

nested_items.name: Preferred
nested_items.description: Indicates that this target is the rightsized migration destination.

nested_items.name: InstanceSizingType
nested_items.description: The size of your target instance. Fleet Advisor calculates this value based on your data collection type, such as total capacity and resource utilization. Valid values include "total-capacity" and "utilization".

nested_items.name: WorkloadType
nested_items.description: The deployment option for your target engine. For production databases, Fleet Advisor chooses Multi-AZ deployment. For development or test databases, Fleet Advisor chooses Single-AZ deployment. Valid values include "development" and "production".

nested_items.name: RdsEngine
nested_items.description: The recommendation of a target Amazon RDS database engine.

nested_items.name: RequirementsToTarget
nested_items.description: Supplemental information about the requirements to the recommended target database on Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: EngineEdition
nested_items.description: The required target Amazon RDS engine edition.

nested_items.name: InstanceVcpu
nested_items.description: The required number of virtual CPUs (vCPU) on the Amazon RDS DB instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceMemory
nested_items.description: The required memory on the Amazon RDS DB instance.

nested_items.name: StorageSize
nested_items.description: The required Amazon RDS DB instance storage size.

nested_items.name: StorageIops
nested_items.description: The required number of I/O operations completed each second (IOPS) on your Amazon RDS DB instance.

nested_items.name: DeploymentOption
nested_items.description: The required deployment option for the Amazon RDS DB instance. Valid values include "MULTI_AZ" for Multi-AZ deployments and "SINGLE_AZ" for Single-AZ deployments.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The required target Amazon RDS engine version.

nested_items.name: TargetConfiguration
nested_items.description: Supplemental information about the configuration of the recommended target database on Amazon RDS.

nested_items.name: EngineEdition
nested_items.description: Describes the recommended target Amazon RDS engine edition.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: Describes the recommended target Amazon RDS instance type.

nested_items.name: InstanceVcpu
nested_items.description: Describes the number of virtual CPUs (vCPU) on the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance that meets your requirements.

nested_items.name: InstanceMemory
nested_items.description: Describes the memory on the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance that meets your requirements.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: Describes the storage type of the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance that meets your requirements.

nested_items.name: StorageSize
nested_items.description: Describes the storage size of the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance that meets your requirements.

nested_items.name: StorageIops
nested_items.description: Describes the number of I/O operations completed each second (IOPS) on the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance that meets your requirements.

nested_items.name: DeploymentOption
nested_items.description: Describes the deployment option for the recommended Amazon RDS DB instance. The deployment options include Multi-AZ and Single-AZ deployments. Valid values include "MULTI_AZ" and "SINGLE_AZ".

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Describes the recommended target Amazon RDS engine version.
